name: obsidian-dropbox-photo-grid
description: Display photos from Dropbox in a grid layout for Obsidian

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp versions.json dist/ && cp -r styles.css dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Ali Moeeny
